recipesJson.name: White Chocolate Peppermint Custard
recipesJson.author: Conradvape
recipesJson.description: I'm gonna be getting my fall flavors ready for the holidays so mix this up and steep it for like a week or so and U will have a wonderful custard with a slight peppermint twist

reviews.text: I can’t believe no one has posted a review on this. This honestly struck me as one of the weirdest combinations of flavors. White chocolate peppermint and custard? No way. But I have to admit that this shit bangs. I’ve been enjoying the hell out of it. It’s sweet, creamy, refreshing and delightful to experience through and through!
